attributes.title: Terrible👎
attributes.review: I went to open the app and it was incredibly slow, and unresponsive, it also caused my phone to stop functioning correctly, and is overall a pointless app, Trump already has a website so a app is sorta pointless

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: If I could give this app zero stars I would. It’s truly sad to see how such a successful “businessman” could create something so utterly disappointing and appalling in terms of function and overall aesthetic. In simple terms so this so called “businessman” can understand, it’s bad and SAD.

attributes.title: Crash
attributes.review: Every-time i would be in the app or have the app open in general my phone would stop for a second and then come back, and sometimes my phone would just turn off.

attributes.title: ✨this app killed whatever brain cells i had left✨
attributes.review: i was so delighted to see what our wonderful orange of a president had to say on this app, but am displeased to announce that i no longer have brain cells. also i want this app off the app store bc i stg is tik tok goes bye bye then i guarantee so does half of gen z patience. DONT MESS WITH GEN Z. tik tok is life.

attributes.title: Don’t like it
attributes.review: I just really don’t like it and I feel like you could have done better but no you didn’t so it’s 1 star you couldn’t make America better and you can’t even make an app better America is disappointed in you

attributes.title: to the pig covered in cheeto dust...
attributes.review: congrats on the last 4 years! you’ve done absolutely nothing to benefit the people in this country unless they look like joe exotic’s distant cousins. you and your ice machine have hurt my people, genuine hard working people, but you wouldn’t know what that is huh? you big fat tub of lard! also let your son be normal like holy cow not only are you controlling this country like a dictator but i can’t imagine being related to you or having to say “yeah donny t grounded me and won’t let me be a normal kid” pathetic.

attributes.title: Made my phone crash every time!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app in order to keep up with the wonderful actions this president is doing but I am very disappointed... the app crashes my phone phone every time i open it. for that reason, 1 star and Biden 2020 😘✨🧚‍♀️

attributes.title: this app gives me anxiety
attributes.review: the app is terrible. continues to crash on me and every time i try to use it it makes my phone spaz. i though my phone was broken but it was the defective app. please be better. if you can’t make an APPLICATION then you cannot be a prez.

attributes.title: Garbage
attributes.review: This app was so hard to navigate and could use a few updates to be better. I would recommend a new president who isn’t a racist piece of trash as a good start. As soon as he is disposed of, remake the the app with a new mascot that won’t get copyrighted for being a Cheeto.

attributes.title: B A D
attributes.review: When i intially downloaded the app it hacked all my data and stole all my information. Then I got a letter on my front doorstep that said “vote trump 2020, and we won’t use your credit card to spend millions” and it’s was signed “congress💖😚” i would not recommend this app, 0/10
